validation_comments.fail_on_coverage_integrity: When true, validation fails if declared coverage differs from actual coverage by >3%. Set to false during coverage recovery to allow gradual improvements without blocking CI.

auto_monitor_comments.schedule: Cron expression: '0 8 */3 * *' = Every 3 days at 8:00 UTC
auto_monitor_comments.max_drift_risk: Threshold for creating drift risk issues (default: 60)
auto_monitor_comments.max_reports: Maximum reports to retain in docs/auto-health-reports/ (default: 30 = ~90 days)
